casebody.data:
THE WILLIAM E. FERGUSON. THE LANGFOND. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. January 8, 1903.) Nos. 10, 11. Appeals from the District Court of the United States for the Eastern District of New York. •Chas. T; Terry, for appellant. Le Roy S. Gove, for The Ferguson. F. M. Brown, for The Langfond.

Before WALLACE, LACQMBE, and CONE, Circuit Judges.

No opinion. Affirmed, on opinion of court below. 102 Fed. 699.
